maxValue.title: Max Value
maxValue.description: The upper of the product characteristic.

minValue.title: Min Value
minValue.description: The lower value of the product characteristic.

unitCode.title: Unit Code
unitCode.description: The unit of measurement given using the UN/CEFACT Common Code (3 characters).

value.title: Value
value.description: The value of the product characteristic.

valueReference.title: Value Reference
valueReference.description: A pointer to a secondary value that provides additional information on the original value, e.g. a reference temperature.
